name: Deck Hero
description:
Hey, thanks for visiting the page! If you find any bug, please comment down bellow.

I made this game to test some concepts with scriptable objects in unity. It took like 5 days to make it and im pretty satisfied with it(except for the damage calculation, still didnt figure out a way to make it work properly). 

You just pick random cards that add buffs to your warrior and the auto-battle system do the rest for you.

Heroes and Monsters by: https://0x72.itch.io

Fire Wizard by: https://luizmelo.itch.io

Skeleton by: https://jesse-m.itch.io

The other assets were made by me.
